Made by Gearbox Software and originally released in 2001 as an add-on to Half-Life, Blue Shift is a return to the Black Mesa Research Facility in which you play as Barney Calhoun, the security guard sidekick who helped Gordon out of so many sticky situations.

Short and sweet, more original Half-Life action with a good side story

POV: You are barney.mdl
Half Life Blue Shift это 2 дополнение к ХЛ. На этот раз мы играем за охранника под именем Барни Калхун.
Графика, Геймплей: Всё тот же хл 1. Даже новую механику, хотя бы кривую (да, я про верёвки в оппосинг форс) не завезли.
Сюжет: Мы едем на работу как вдруг наш кореш Гордон Фримен делаю каскадный резонанс. После этого нам приходится выживать пока мы не наткнёмся на военных. Они держут в заложниках одного учённого, который говорит про своего коллегу доктора Розенберга. Мы его находим и собираемся телепортироватся из Мезы (там ведь ещё бомба заложена, мы про неё узнаем в оппосинг форс). Как вдруг нам рассказывают про монстров которых мы встретили на пути. Они из пограничного мира Зена. Мы должны туда отправится и включить генератор для выполнения нашей цели. Но не тут то было, аккумулятор сдох. Мы находим замену и начинается телепорт. И вот когда мы должны свалить из мезы приходят 2-3 солдата. Мы их расскатываем и хеппи энд.
Смысл разработки: расширение вселенной и бабло. Спрашивается, а фигли тут нет новых механик? Всё просто. Халф лайф собирались портировать на сегу дримкаст с новыми уровнями за охранника. Но всё пошло по канонам Халфы, а наработки выкидывать обидно.
Советую ли я покупать эту игру? Спорно, если хотите скоротать вечерок на часик-2 и если вам понравилась первая хл и оппосинг форс то берите.
Blue Shift may not be as long or renowned as Opposing Force, but it's nonetheless an outstanding expansion upon the original Half-Life with an intriguing story and more great gameplay!
Half-Life Blue Shift.Легендарная игра,которая рассказывает нам о охраннике.Он попадает в катастрофу с Черной Месой.Нам придется играть за него.
It's short and sweet, but it also doesn't have much substance.

Not amazing, but not terrible. One of the shorter expansions for Half Life. Shows the Black Mesa incident from a different perspective and you get to see what being a Guard is like. And the vibe dose feel similar to the vibe the Half-Life 1 gives. But a lot of the levels is pretty meh. There's some good old HL combat, but some levels aren't really that interesting. Overall, nothing too interesting, but it's nothing bad and does fill that need for some more OG Half Life. Personally would recommend starting with this one first before Opposing Force, as it's similar to HL1 in overall gameplay and is shorter.
an okay expansion to the Half Life series, but it's nothing to write home about

Blue Shift is a smaller Half-Life story that, while not as revolutionary as the base game or as flashy as Opposing Force, is absolutely worth your time. It has the fun combat. clever puzzles, and genius storytelling of the original without any of the frustration, making it a sort of "best hits" collection for Half-Life 1 fans. Sure, it's short, and sure, it doesn't add too much to the formula, but those are the exact reasons why I see myself replaying this game whenever I have an itch for some classic FPS action. After all, you can easily beat this game in an afternoon. When you don't have the time to commit to a full playthrough of Half-Life, try scratching that FPS itch with Blue Shift.

A great expansion for Half-Life, and at $4.99, it's no surprise it's very short (I beat it in 2.5hrs). I wouldn't consider this a problem as Blue Shift serves more as a side story, and might as well be DLC for the original Half-Life. The puzzles are surprisingly well constructed and the way the story intertwines with the Main Game is quite the novelty. Highly recommend!

I don't know though, maybe it will be different for you.

Well, Half-Life: Blue Shift is still a good game after all this years.
[i]Troubleshooting[/i] - Like the other two games from the first series, Blue Shift do not boot directly on Linux Manjaro, despite that it is a Linux native game. But again, the compatibility with the latest Proton 5.13-6 works perfectly. I mean too perfectly - even the (in)famous glitch from back in the day is here. After reloading a quick save the current weapon starts automatically shooting until it is switched. Well, when people are saying that Proton compiles games perfectly, I didn't expected that even the original glitches will be transferred. Anyway, as I said - most of the glitches are from the game itself and not from the compatibility layer. Also, it comes with installed HD-pack. This means that the Glock, the MP5 and the shotgun are reskinned to Beretta, M16 and SPAS.
[i]Quality[/i] - Even that the game is much shorter that the previous two, it is still enjoyable. Honestly I rather prefer "Blue Shift" then "Opposing Force". Maybe because the main character is an average security guard instead of a spec-force commando or a scientist in a high-tech suit.
[i]Final thoughts[/i] - As we all know: "the best friend of the gamer is the seasonal sale". So, It is better to wait for discount and buy one of the bundles.

The game is very fun and adds onto the story of the Half-Life Universe, making the story even more interesting for fans. The game runs on the same engine Half Life was created on, and adds a new perspective on the Resonance Cascade at the Black Mesa Research Facility. I suggest you play Half-Life first, then play Blue Shift, then play Opposing Forces and you get three perspectives on the incident that created the story and universe of Half-Life. I love Half Life and its Expansion packs, it adds so much to the story and is super fun to play in your spare time.

HL1'deki hiçbir ağır silahın olmadığı, elinizde sadece shotgun, MP5 ve tabancalarınızın olduğu, aşırı zor ve hardcore bir oynanışa sahip HL oyunudur. Goldsource manyağıysanız %100 tavsiye ederim, değilseniz sarmaz, çünkü insanı yıldırabilecek bir zorluğa sahip. 
Chapter 3'te silahlarımın cephanesi bitti ve yolumu el bombaları ve levye ile temizlemek zorunda kaldım, kazıya kazıya oyunu bitirdim... Zoru sevenler için...
